property.name: createSegFileQuery
property.value: INSERT INTO catgenome.seg ( seg_id, bio_data_item_id, reference_genome_id, index_id, compressed) VALUES ( :SEG_ID, :BIO_DATA_ITEM_ID, :REFERENCE_GENOME_ID, :INDEX_ID, :COMPRESSED)

property.name: loadSegFileQuery
property.value:
SELECT b.bio_data_item_id, b.name, b.type, b.path, b.format, b.created_date, b.bucket_id, b.pretty_name, b.owner,
s.seg_id, s.reference_genome_id as seg_reference_genome_id, s.compressed as seg_compressed,
i.bio_data_item_id as index_id, i.name as index_name, i.type as index_type, i.path as index_path, i.format as index_format, i.bucket_id as index_bucket_id, i.created_date as index_created_date FROM catgenome.seg s JOIN catgenome.biological_data_item b ON s.bio_data_item_id = b.bio_data_item_id JOIN catgenome.biological_data_item i ON i.bio_data_item_id = s.index_id WHERE s.seg_id = ?

property.name: createSamplesForFileQuery
property.value: INSERT INTO catgenome.seg_sample ( seg_sample_id, seg_id, sample_name) VALUES ( :SEG_SAMPLE_ID, :SEG_ID, :SAMPLE_NAME)

property.name: loadSamplesForFileQuery
property.value: SELECT seg_sample_id, sample_name FROM catgenome.seg_sample WHERE seg_id = ?

property.name: loadSamplesByFileIdsQuery
property.value: SELECT s.seg_sample_id, s.sample_name, s.seg_id FROM catgenome.seg_sample s JOIN t_list tmp ON s.seg_id = tmp.list_value WHERE tmp.list_id = ?

property.name: loadSamplesForFilesByReferenceIdQuery
property.value: SELECT s.seg_sample_id, s.sample_name, s.seg_id FROM catgenome.seg_sample s JOIN catgenome.seg f ON s.seg_id = f.seg_id WHERE f.reference_genome_id = ? ORDER BY s.seg_id
